title: Keep Me Searching for a Heart of Gold (feat. Josh Adam Meyers)
description:
Comedian Josh Adam Meyers joins The Bonfire and tells the campers about the woman with a heart of gold he met while performing shows on the road. 

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire 

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM
